titleStmt.title: Jeremy Ives sober request proved in the matter of it to be false, impertinent and impudent [by] W.P.
titleStmt.author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.

notesStmt.note: William Penn's answer to Ives' "Sober request"--Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in the Friends' Library (London, England)
